wikipedia_page.main: Sir Sydney John Chapman KCB CBE (20 April 1871 – 29 August 1951) was an English economist and civil servant. He was Chief Economic Adviser to HM Government from 1927 to 1932.

response: *1951 – Sydney Chapman, English economist and civil servant (b. 1871)
*1871 – Sydney Chapman, English economist and civil servant (d. 1951)
*Sir Sydney Chapman (economist) (1871–1951), British economist and civil servant
* Sydney Chapman, economist and civil servant
